website_summaries.verdict: This larger felt letter board is the perfect home addition for families looking for a super-sized decor frame.
pros: Available to purchase in four different colors
Features a larger 16 by 20-inch design with a frame made of solid oak
Includes canvas bag to hold 290 characters
cons: Wood frame could be better quality
Customers wish the product came with more letters

customer_reviews.title: Same quality board as Letter Folk & other Amazon Brands but half the letters
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars bc it came with half the amount of letters my friends did from a similar brand on Amazon; that is the same price too. She got 2 sets of letters both large and small upper case along with loads of punctuation marks and plenty of vowels. I barely have enough E’s to do a quote. Wish this company would give double the amount of letters. Other than that beautiful board and you can’t tell a difference between it and a letter folk board at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Atalie Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board! Big enough to set up a weekly verse from the Dhammapada. I need to get more letters, though. When the board arrived there was a bit of sawdust on it, but that vacuumed right off. The wood frame seems unfinished, so if you wants to paint it, it should stick well. I appreciate that the letters were uncut when they arrived. I use a nail clipper to cut them so that they don’t have any scratchy jags. The letters for this board are 1” high, so they are easily visible. This board is excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Math Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the by
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. I have it by my back door and change up the saying every few days. So much fun. It's good quality. Since I will be handling it a lot I added wire to the back.
customer_reviews.author: A.Giokas

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a lot of letters!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this board! I got the 16x20 and love the size for what I planned to use it for! I had plenty of letters left over, too.
customer_reviews.author: mclark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect letter board
customer_reviews.text: This board arrived in perfect condition. The natural wood frame is exactly what I wanted and the size is great! The letters are on the smaller side and a lot of verbiage will fit so if you are looking for bigger letters you might have to purchase them separately. I recommend this 100%, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size for a letterboard
customer_reviews.text: Most letter boards that I have seen for sale are either too expensive or too small for the things I'd like to say with them. This is big enough that you can "write" a lot without it feeling crowded, the price is the best I've found, and it's well-constructed. It came with two sheets of letters that were easy to pop off, and I began putting letters on it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Awesome letter board for the price. Ordered the big one and glad I did! Will probably stain the wood to be a little darker. But other than that, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Linder

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to teach. It’s now my trademark. Students look forward to what the board says!
customer_reviews.author: RENEGADE

customer_reviews.title: So fun to have on the wall!
customer_reviews.text: This it the most fun thing I've ever had on the wall in my home. I change the message every couple of weeks and my kids get a kick out of it. Plenty of letters came with it, but I think I may get a couple sets of the larger letters since this board is pretty dang large.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product
customer_reviews.text: The letters are a little cheaply made, but overall this is what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda niekamp

customer_reviews.title: Letters are poorly designed and do not hold!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this product at my office but I am very very upset with the way the letters are designed. They are poorly made and do not hold. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: kbk

customer_reviews.title: The board seems to be good quality and is a little less expensive than other ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this board as a Christmas present. Based on the answers to questions posted by the seller, I thought I was going to get 1” letters with this board, which makes sense because the board is so big. I ordered an extra set of 1” letters so there would be plenty of symbols and letters for use at a business. When I received the board it came with a set of 3/4” letters. Wish this had been more clear in the description because now my extra letter set is a different size so it can’t be used interchangeably. The board seems to be good quality and is a little less expensive than other brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Board
customer_reviews.text: The board came wrapped and in great condition. I have ordered a few and I really loved the quality and sturdiness of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rieke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and delivered on time. Really happy with the product, but giving 4 stars because I wish the letters were a bit bigger for the larger boards. They look pretty tiny once placed. However, I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality product! I ordered this for my home so I would have preferred a black frame and cutting off all the letters was a bit time consuming but still love this message board. Very fun piece to have!
customer_reviews.author: Marcee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Board came in just as ordered. Excellent quality and exceeded expectations. I would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Judge M. Bugbee

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Letters stay put and fit snug
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality heavy board! Love it! Letters stay put and fit snug. Just wish it came with more letters
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Zharkova

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Came in great condition. So many letters. Can't wait to get bigger letters in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Megane S.

customer_reviews.title: 16x20 Changeable Letter Board
customer_reviews.text: I love the letter board I bought for my office. It’s the perfect size and very sturdy...we will enjoy it for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Cotney

customer_reviews.title: Great for snack bars.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a soccer league snack bar and it worked great. Only thing is we needed to buy more letters.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rand

customer_reviews.title: we have been very happy with the letter board
customer_reviews.text: So far, we have been very happy with the letter board.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Overton

customer_reviews.title: The product is great! My daughter wanted it to use for her ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great! My daughter wanted it to use for her wedding and then in her apartment. Everything was exactly as pictured and she's thrilled with it! Will order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Roberts

customer_reviews.title: 16x20 changeable letter board
customer_reviews.text: Love this chalk free board!! So cute and great size.
customer_reviews.author: Kate J Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and in great condition. Used it for a corporate event. Highly recommend and will buy again for future events. Size is perfect to use on an easel.
customer_reviews.author: Damisi A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and plenty of letters!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I went with this product! Super awesome and easy to use. It comes with plenty of letters, which was one of my main concerns about purchasing it. It's also the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Christina Hammersen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Exactly what I expected. Worth the couple extra bucks for the difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Downs

customer_reviews.title: Perf!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured! Love it :) more than enough letters for anything I’ve wanted to spell out. Lots of compliments from my office-mates!
customer_reviews.author: Erin D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Easy to use. The letters come with a bag to store away in. Great variance in letters, numbers and symbols.
customer_reviews.author: Dalia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Letters don’t fall out. Tons of letters. Great size board. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, good felt material)
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality!! The board is very well made (real wood, very sturdy, good felt material), it came with plenty of letters, and was the perfect size for this kind of item. Exactly what I was looking for. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fulfilled all my letter board dreams! It is exactly as described and comes with plenty of letters.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great price! So glad to have found this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Letterboxes!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s exactly what I wanted! Very well made and arrived on time too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jill B.

customer_reviews.title: 16x20 Letterboard
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! Very sturdy and made from high quality materials! Good communication and excellent customer service. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sauerbry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, and it looks wonderful in my kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. Great style and quality. Very fair price compared to other boards on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mladenka

customer_reviews.title: No letters included!!
customer_reviews.text: The board is great but arrived without any letters, just the empty drawstring bag.
customer_reviews.author: christina jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent teacher present!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas present for my favorite teacher. I think he's going to have a ball, putting up inspiring messages or bits of poetry or stern warnings to finish essays. I suppose he could also post his office hours on it, but he's not that boring kind of professor. I was promised a puppy hug for this review, so I hope there's a happy puppy around here somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Beej

product_meta.title: Executive Office Solutions Changeable Letter Board - Black Felt with Solid Oak Frame, Wall Mount, Canvas Bag, and 290 Characters 16x20 Black - (LB3)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:16x20 Inch

THE PERFECT DISPLAY

EXCELLENT FOR LIFE EVENTS OR FOR USE AS A SIGN

Whether you are tracking milestones in your childrens’ lives, or need a letter board to display prices in your coffee shop, this is the perfect solution for you! And elegant frame on a black felt surface make this letterboard stand out.
feature_bullets: IMPRESS YOUR GUESTS – With The Vintage Style Solid Oak Frame and The Sharp Contrast Of the Black Felt, This Letter Board Will Be The Center Piece Of Your Party, Event, or Display.

MULTIPLE MOUNTING OPTIONS – This Letter Board Comes With A Saw-Tooth Clip On The Back For Hanging On The Wall. It Can Also Lay Vertical On a Wall, Tabletop, Desktop, Headboard, or Esal. Can Easily Be Held By Mid-Size Children to Adults.

290 CHARACTERS – This Kit Includes Multiple Letters, Numbers, and Special Characters Including Commas, Decimals, @ Signs, Dollar Signs, Arrow, Forward Slashes and More. A Canvas Bag Is Included As a Free Bonus To Store The Letters.

SUITABLE FOR MANY EVENTS – This Board Can Be Used As a Sign Or Decorative Piece At Any Event. It Is Also a Clean Alternative To Dry Erase And Chalk Boards. Use It As an Cute Addition To The Nursery, Or It Can Be Held For Pictures. Another Option Is To Use It For a Restaurant or Café Price Board.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
